About Us
We love a good cocktail and a good time!  So much so that husband and wife, Erik and Melissa, created Catered Cocktails in 2003.
We met many years ago when we were both in the hospitality industry.  Now we have been married almost 25 years, together for 30 years, and have raised 2 awesome kids.  #Blessed
We LOVE hosting and making sure everyone always feels welcome and has a good time, whether it’s in our home or at your event.  Our southern upbringing and years and years of experience as hospitality professionals has a big role in how we approach our events
Our Promise To You
We treat our clients like family, and it’s not unusual for our meetings to end in hugs instead of handshakes.  We believe every occasion deserves warm, genuine and authentic connections.  It’s our goal to provide that to you.

About Us
We are family owned and operated business that started in 2003 by husband and wife, Melissa & Erik.  We met many years ago when we were both in the hospitality industry.  Now we have been married almost 25 years, together for 30 years, and have raised 2 awesome kids.  #Blessed
We LOVE hosting and making sure everyone always feels welcome and has a good time, whether it’s in our home or at your event.  Our southern upbringing and years and years of experience as hospitality professionals has a big role in how we approach our events
Our Promise To You
We treat our clients like family, and it’s not unusual for our meetings to end in hugs instead of handshakes.  We believe every occasion deserves warm, genuine and authentic connections.  It’s our goal to provide that to you.
Large Scale Events
Catered Cocktails has been a part of 7 large-scale events over the years such as One Spark, Sea & Sky Spectacular, World of Nations, and the Jacksonville Jazz Festival.  This experience gives us the advantage in logistics and management of multi day, multi serving station events.  If you are planning an event in Northeast Florida or South Georgia and need assistance in managing the bar piece of the event, please contact Melissa to schedule a consultation.
LET'S CHAT
